@author's adventure started a long time ago in the wilderness around @town
@author's adventure began when they were only young in the streets of @town
@author's adventure began while trading with @profession's at @town
@profession's tell of a mysterious @folk who travelled the @place's looking for a @item that belonged to @author
a @combatant reported a development near @town, which was investigated by @author
@author was a retired @combatant who had one last adventure which started in @town
@author's adventure began when they found a mysterious sign near @dungeon
@author met a powerful legendary @combatant, who gives them a quest to go to a @place
@author finds a rich @profession, who gives them a quest to seek out @town
@author met a brilliant yet infamous @combatant, who gives them a quest to investigate a @place
@author met a @folk of their father, who gives them a task at @town
@author stumbled upon an @item, which set them on a quest to seek out a @place
@author located a @place, but on their way discovered a quest
@author was bored with their life until a @folk gave them a secret @dungeon quest
@author met a wandering @folk who died infront of them, holding valuable information for the @town guards
@author had to resolve a mysterious kidnapping of local @folk at @town
@author had to end a rash of major thefts from the rich and powerful by entering @town
@author found a rise in the local monstrous population within a @place
@author discovered unexplained deaths among the local nobility near @town
A @profession's wagon was found in a ditch battered and broken by the adventurer. All their trinkets were cursed but later found at @town
A group of @combatant's set up a traveling circus, tricking bystanders at @town
A @combatant's camp was set up, celebrating the @event. A mysterious figure approached them and hired their services to raid @town
whilst adventuring, a drunken @profession asks them to find an @item at @dungeon which belonged to their mother
during their journey, the adventurer became pursued by @folk's after @event near @dungeon
every night vivid nightmares about @trait @folk boil up out of the @combatant's consciousness, beseeching them to seek out a distant @place
At a @place, two family's became engaged in an all out war over an @event
Strangers report a @trait @combatant that lived in a dark @place. @trait @folk pursued them out of hiding
@author determined it was the work of a rich @profession, who lived at @town
@author determined it is the work of the @folk of one his closest relative, who got killed at @dungeon
@author worked hard to find a clever @folk, and pursued them across treacherous @place's
@author determined it is the work of a nobleman of @trait character, they sought to report them to authorities at @town
@author determined it is the work of a pious and powerful @combatant of @trait intent. Legend said they retreated to a @place
@author managed to figure out that it was his @profession friend all along who betrayed his loved ones and locked them at @dungeon
@author was about to give up when a hooded @trait @folk presented them with an @item from @dungeon
@author travelled to a desecrated @dungeon to find a @trait @profession
@author travelled to the ruins of an @dungeon to find their @trait nemesis
@author ended up fleeing to a nearby @town in a desperate attempt to save themselves from being @gruesomeend at @dungeon
@author ended up searching isolated farms and outlying areas around @town
@author pursued them to @place's to find bring them to justice
